metadata.title: RHSA-2022:8090: runc security update (Low)
metadata.description:
The runC tool is a lightweight, portable implementation of the Open Container Format (OCF) that provides container runtime.

Security Fix(es):

* runc: incorrect handling of inheritable capabilities (CVE-2022-29162)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.1 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2022-29162 runc: incorrect handling of inheritable capabilities

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
runc is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
